Audio.Locality: Reserva Ecológica de Guapi Açu (REGUA), RJ
Audio.Author: Eric DeFonso
Audio.Comments: Extended cut of natural sounds at a presumed lek site. This exchange was recorded in the same session as XC131333, but about a minute later. Recorded from the Green Trail that heads into the higher hills of the reserve.bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
